entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is described as standing up and looking down at the four in front of him with pure hatred in his face.

entities.name: the boy
entities.description: The boy is described as having straw-colored hair and trying to speak to Crouch.

entities.name: the council of magical law
entities.description: The Council of Magical Law is mentioned as the authority that will pass judgment on the four in front of Crouch.

relationships.description: Crouch is referred to as 'Father' by the boy, indicating a parent-child relationship between them.
Crouch is speaking on behalf of the Council of Magical Law, indicating an authority-judgment relationship between Crouch and the Council.
